entities.name: OrderProduct
entities.description: Line item in a sales order.

attributes.name: salesOrderDetailId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the product specified in the order.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: baseAmount
attributes.description: Shows the total price of the order product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: baseAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the order product, such as manufacturing details or acceptable substitutions.

attributes.name: extendedAmount
attributes.description: Shows the total amount due for the order product, based on the sum of the unit price, quantity, discounts, and tax.

attributes.name: extendedAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: isCopied
attributes.description: Select whether the invoice line item is copied from another item or data source.

attributes.name: isPriceOverridden
attributes.description: Select whether the price per unit is fixed at the value in the specified price list or can be overridden by users who have edit rights to the order product.

attributes.name: isProductOverridden
attributes.description: Select whether the product exists in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 product catalog or is a write-in product specific to the order.

attributes.name: lineItemNumber
attributes.description: Type the line item number for the order product to easily identify the product in the order and make sure it's listed in the correct sequence.

attributes.name: manualDiscountAmount
attributes.description: Type the manual discount amount for the order product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total on the order.

attributes.name: manualDiscountAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Manual Discount in base currency.

attributes.name: parentBundleId
attributes.description: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product

attributes.name: productAssociationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the product line item association with bundle in the sales order

attributes.name: productTypeCode
attributes.description: Product Type

attributes.name: pricePerUnit
attributes.description: Type the price per unit of the order product. The default is the value in the price list specified on the order for existing products.

attributes.name: pricePerUnitBase
attributes.description: Value of the Price Per Unit in base currency.

attributes.name: pricingErrorCode
attributes.description: Select the type of pricing error, such as a missing or invalid product, or missing quantity.

attributes.name: productDescription
attributes.description: Type a name or description to identify the type of write-in product included in the order.

attributes.name: productName
attributes.description: Calculated field that will be populated by name and description of the product.

attributes.name: productId
attributes.description: Choose the product to include on the order to link the product's pricing and other information to the parent order.

attributes.name: quantity
attributes.description: Type the amount or quantity of the product ordered by the customer.

attributes.name: quantityBackordered
attributes.description: Type the amount or quantity of the product that is back ordered for the order.

attributes.name: quantityCancelled
attributes.description: Type the amount or quantity of the product that was canceled.

attributes.name: quantityShipped
attributes.description: Type the amount or quantity of the product that was shipped for the order.

attributes.name: requestDeliveryBy
attributes.description: Enter the delivery date requested by the customer for the order product.

attributes.name: salesOrderId
attributes.description: Shows the order for the product. The ID is used to link product pricing and other details to the total amounts and other information on the order.

attributes.name: salesOrderIsPriceLocked
attributes.description: Tells whether product pricing is locked for the order.

attributes.name: salesOrderStateCode
attributes.description: Shows the status of the order that the order detail is associated with.

attributes.name: salesRepId
attributes.description: Choose the user responsible for the sale of the order product.

attributes.name: shipToAddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToCity
attributes.description: Type the city for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToContactName
attributes.description: Type the primary contact name at the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToCountry
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToFax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToFreightTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

attributes.name: shipToLine1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToLine2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToLine3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToName
attributes.description: Type a name for the customer's shipping address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office",  to identify the address.

attributes.name: shipToPostalCode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToStateOrProvince
attributes.description: Type the state or province for the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToTelephone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: tax
attributes.description: Type the tax amount for the order product.

attributes.name: taxBase
attributes.description: Value of the Tax in base currency.

attributes.name: uoMId
attributes.description: Choose the unit of measurement for the base unit quantity for this purchase, such as each or dozen.

attributes.name: volumeDiscountAmount
attributes.description: Shows the discount amount per unit if a specified volume is purchased. Configure volume discounts in the Product Catalog in the Settings area.

attributes.name: volumeDiscountAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Volume Discount in base currency.

attributes.name: willCall
attributes.description: Select whether the order product should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

attributes.name: sequenceNumber
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the data that maintains the sequence.

attributes.name: propertyConfigurationStatus
attributes.description: Status of the property configuration.

attributes.name: quoteDetailId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for Quote Line associated with Order Line.

attributes.name: salesOrderDetailName
attributes.description: Sales Order Detail Name. Added for 1:n Referential relationship

attributes.name: parentBundleIdRef
attributes.description: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product
